img_text: Captivated By The Winter King Her surrender brought him to the edge of forgetting himself, and it was only with great difficulty that he broke their kiss. Looking at her, he saw her eyes were closed and her skin was flushed. Her lips were swollen and, when she cracked her eyelids to look at him, they curved into a satisfied smile. He smiled back. "It would be my pleasure, " he answered TASTE THE ECSTASY OF SURRENDER OBy Mistral Dawro
